ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: As a member of the App Review Quality team, the Quality lead oversees and participates in operational quality initiatives. This includes developing strategies and processes as well as hands-on auditing, usability research, analysis, and reporting. The position requires an experienced, self-motivated leader with exceptional analytical skills.

ul.li: Knowledge of quality fundamentals, such as Six Sigma or statistical process control methods
Good understanding of various qualitative and quantitative research techniques such as usability testing and surveys, & usage data analysis
Expertise in Excel, Numbers, Pages, Keynote, JMP
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Team player, with the ability to influence others
Broad software knowledge (HTML, Javascript, SQL, Mac OS, iOS, databases)

div.p: Develop and execute quality-focused plans to meet the objectives of the business Develop and execute usability studies / user experience research Manage data collection through audits, studies, interviews and review of business documentation Perform analysis and reporting Manage metrics Manage Corrective Action Requests (C.A.R). Drive results Develop and maintain Quality program documentation
BS in Industrial Engineering, Business Administration, Information Management, or equivalent experience.
For this position, Apple will not sponsor applicants for work visas or relocation.
